MqlDateTime.description: <struct> structure contains eight fields of the int type

MqlParam.description: <struct> The MqlParam structure has been specially designed to provide input parameters when creating the handle of a technical indicator using the IndicatorCreate() function.

MqlRates.description: <struct> structure stores information about the prices, volumes and spread.

MqlBookInfo.description: <struct> provides information about the market depth data

MqlTradeRequest.description: <struct> Interaction between the client terminal and a trade server for executing the order placing operation is performed by using trade requests.

MqlTradeCheckResult.description: <struct> Before sending a request for a trade operation to a trade server, it is recommended to check it. The check is performed using the OrderCheck() function, to which the checked request and a variable of the MqlTradeCheckResult structure type are passed. The check result will be written to this variable.

MqlTradeResult.description: <struct> As result of a trade request, a trade server returns data about the trade request processing result as a special predefined structure of MqlTradeResult type.

MqlTick.description: <struct> This is a structure for storing the latest prices of the symbol. It is designed for fast retrieval of the most requested information about current prices.

Point.description: <double> Size of the current symbol point in the quote currency

_Period.description: <ENUM_TIMEFRAMES> value of the timeframe of the current chart.

_RandomSeed.description: <int> Variable for storing the current state when generating pseudo-random integers

_StopFlag.description: <bool> contains the flag of the mql5-program stop

_UninitReason.description: <int> contains the code of the program uninitialization reason.

Open.description: <double> Series array that contains open prices of each bar of the current chart

High.description: <double> Series array that contains high prices of each bar of the current chart

Low.description: <double> Series array that contains low prices of each bar of the current chart

Close.description: <double> Series array that contains close prices of each bar of the current chart

Time.description: <datetime> Series array that contains time of each bar of the current chart

Volume.description: <long> Series array that contains volume of each bar of the current chart

Alert.description: <void> Displays a message in a separate window.

Check Pointer.description: <ENUM_POINTER_TYPE> The function returns the type of the object pointer.

Comment.description: <void> outputs a comment defined by a user in the top left corner of a chart.

ExpertRemove.description: <void> stops an Expert Advisor and unloads it from a chart.

GetTickCount.description: <uint> returns the number of milliseconds that elapsed since the system start

GetMicrosecondCount.description: <ulong> returns the number of microseconds that have elapsed since the start of MQL5-program.

MessageBox.description: <int> creates and shows a message box and manages it..

PeriodSeconds.description: <int> number of seconds in a period.

Print.description: <void> enters a message in the Expert Advisor log. Parameters can be of any type.

PrintFormat.description: <void> formats and enters sets of symbols and values in the Expert Advisor log in accordance with a preset format.

ResetLastError.description: <void> Sets the value of the predefined variable _LastError into zero.

SendNotification.description: <bool> Sends push notifications to the mobile terminals, whose MetaQuotes IDs are specified in the "Notifications" tab..

SendMail.description: <bool> Sends an email at the address specified in the settings window of the Email tab.

Sleep.description: <void> The function suspends execution of the current Expert Advisor or script within a specified interval.

TranslateKey.description: <short> Returns a Unicode character by a virtual key code considering the current input language and the status of control keys.

WebRequest.description: <int> sends an HTTP request to a specified server. The function has two versions:

ZeroMemory.description: <void> resets a variable passed to it by reference.

ArraySize.description: <int> The function returns the number of elements of a selected array..

ArrayGetAsSeries.description: <bool> It checks direction of an array index..

ArraySetAsSeries.description: <bool> The function sets the AS_SERIES flag to a selected object of a dynamic array, and elements will be indexed like in timeseries.

ArrayResize.description: <int> The function sets a new size for the first dimension

ArrayInitialize.description: <int> initializes a numeric array by a preset value.

CharToString.description: <tostring> Converting a symbol code into a one-character string.

CharArrayToString.description: <string> It copies and converts part of array of uchar type into a returned string..

ColorToString.description: <string> It converts color value into string of R,G,B form.

DoubleToString.description: <string> Converting numeric value into text string.

EnumToString.description: <string> Converting an enumeration value of any type to a text form.

TimeToString.description: <string> Converting a value containing time in seconds elapsed since 01.01.1970 into a string of yyyy.mm.dd hh:mi format.

NormalizeDouble.description: <double> Rounding floating point number to a specified accuracy.

StringToCharArray.body: StringToCharArray(${1:string text_string}, ${2:uchar& array[]}, ${3:int start=0}, ${4:int count=-1}, ${5:uint codepage=CP_ACP})$0
StringToCharArray.description: <int> Symbol-wise copies a string converted from Unicode to ANSI, to a selected place of array of uchar type. It returns the number of copied elements.

StringToTime.description: <datetime> converts a string containing time or date in yyyy.mm.dd [hh:mi] format into datetime type.

StringFormat.description: <string> The function formats obtained parameters and returns a string.

MathAbs.description: <double> The function returns the absolute value (modulus) of the specified numeric value.

MathPow.description: <double> The function returns the absolute value (modulus) of the specified numeric value.

MathArcsin.description: <double> returns the arc sine of x within the range of -π/2 to π/2 radians.

MathArccos.description: <double> returns the arccosine of x within the range 0 to π in radians.

MathCeil.description: <double> returns integer numeric value closest from above.

MathFloor.description: <double> returns integer numeric value closest from below.

MathLog10.description: <double> Returns the logarithm of a number by base 10.

MathMax.description: <double> returns the maximal value of two values.

MathMin.description: <double> returns the minimal value of two values.

MathRand.description: <int> Returns a pseudorandom integer within the range of 0 to 32767.

MathSrand.description: <void> Sets the starting point for generating a series of pseudorandom integers.

MathRound.description: <double> returns a value rounded off to the nearest integer of the specified numeric value.

MathIsValidNumber.description: <bool> checks the correctness of a real number

MathSqrt.description: <double> Returns the square root of a number.

TimeCurrentStruct.description: <datetime> MqlDateTime structure type variable has been passed as a parameter, it is filled accordingly

TimeCurrent.description: <datetime> Returns the last known server time

TimeTradeServer.description: <datetime> Returns the calculated current time of the trade server

TimeLocal.description: <datetime> Returns the local time of a computer

TimeLocal Struct.description: <datetime> Returns the local time of a computer; fills struct

TimeGMT.description: <datetime> Returns the GMT, which is calculated taking into account the DST switch by the local time on the computer where the client terminal is running.

TimeGMT Struct.description: <datetime> Returns the GMT, which is calculated taking into account the DST switch by the local time on the computer where the client terminal is running.

TimeDaylightSavings.description: <datetime> Returns correction for daylight saving time in seconds, if the switch to summer time has been made.

TimeGMTOffset.description: <datetime> Returns the current difference between GMT time and the local computer time in seconds

TimeToStruct.description: <bool> Converts a value of datetime type (number of seconds since 01.01.1970) into a structure variable MqlDateTime.

StructToTime.description: <datetime> Converts a structure variable MqlDateTime into a value of datetime type and returns the resulting value.

StringAdd.description: <bool> adds a substring to the end of a string.

StringBufferLen.description: <int> returns the size of buffer allocated for the string.

StringCompare.description: <int> compares two strings and returns the comparison result in form of an integer.Case sensitivity mode selection. If it is true, then A>a. If it is false, then A=a.

StringFill.description: <bool> It fills out a selected string by specified symbols

StringFind.description: <int> Search for a substring in a string.

StringGetCharacter.description: <ushort> returns value of a symbol, located in the specified position of a string.

StringLen.description: <int> Returns the number of symbols in a string

description: <int> replaces all the found substrings of a string by a set sequence of symbols.
The function returns the number of replacements in case of success, otherwise -1. To get an error code call the GetLastError() function.

StringSplit.description: <int> Gets substrings by a specified separator from the specified string, returns the number of substrings obtained.

StringSubstr.description: <string> Extracts a substring from a text string starting from the specified position.

StringToLower.description: <bool> Transforms all symbols of a selected string into lowercase.

StringToUpper.description: <bool> Transforms all symbols of a selected string into capitals.

StringTrimRight.description: <int> The function cuts line feed characters, spaces and tabs in the right part of the string after the last meaningful symbol. The string is modified at place.

StringTrimLeft.description: <int> The function cuts line feed characters, spaces and tabs in the left part of the string till the first meaningful symbol. The string is modified at place.

AccountInfoDouble.description: <double> Returns the value of the corresponding account property.

AccountInfoInteger.description: <long> Returns the value of the corresponding account property.

AccountInfoString.description: <string> Returns the value of the corresponding account property.

ACCOUNT_LIMIT_ORDERS.description: <int> Maximum allowed number of active pending orders

ACCOUNT_MARGIN_SO_MODE.description: <ENUM_ACCOUNT_STOPOUT_MODE> Mode for setting the minimal allowed margin

ACCOUNT_TRADE_ALLOWED.description: <bool> Allowed trade for the current account

ACCOUNT_TRADE_EXPERT.description: <bool> Allowed trade for an Expert Advisor

GetLastError.description: <int> Returns the contents of the system variable _LastError

IsStopped.description: <bool> Checks the forced shutdown of an mql5 program

UninitializeReason.description: <int> Returns the code of a reason for deinitialization.

TerminalInfoInteger.description: <long> Returns the value of a corresponding property of the mql5 program environment

TerminalInfoDouble.description: <double> Returns the value of a corresponding property of the mql5 program environment

TerminalInfoString.description: <string> Returns the value of a corresponding property of the mql5 program environment

MQLInfoInteger.description: <int> Returns the value of a corresponding property of a running mql5 program.

MQLInfoString.description: <string> Returns the value of a corresponding property of a running mql5 program.

SymbolsTotal.description: <int> Returns the number of available (selected in Market Watch or all) symbols.

SymbolName.description: <string> returns the name of the symbol from the marketwatch window.

SymbolSelect.description: <bool> Selects a symbol in the Market Watch window or removes a symbol from the window.

SymbolIsSynchronized.description: <bool> The function checks whether data of a selected symbol in the terminal are synchronized with data on the trade server.

SymbolInfoTick.description: <bool> returns current prices of a specified symbol in a variable of the MqlTick type.

MarketBookAdd.description: <bool> Provides opening of Depth of Market for a selected symbol, and subscribes for receiving notifications of the DOM changes.

MarketBookRelease.description: <bool> Provides closing of Depth of Market for a selected symbol, and cancels the subscription for receiving notifications of the DOM changes.

MarketBookGet.description: <bool> Returns a structure array MqlBookInfo containing records of the Depth of Market of a specified symbol.

SymbolInfoInteger.description: <long> Returns the corresponding property of a specified symbol.

SymbolInfoString.description: <string> Returns the corresponding property of a specified symbol.

SymbolInfoDouble.description: <double> Returns the corresponding property of a specified symbol.

SeriesInfoInteger.description: <long> Returns information about the state of historical data.

Bars_From_To.description: <int> Returns the number of bars count in the history for a specified symbol and period.

Bars.description: <int> Returns the number of bars count in the history for a specified symbol and period.

BarsCalculated.description: <int> Returns the number of calculated data for the specified indicator

IndicatorRelease.description: <bool> removes an indicator handle and releases the calculation block of the indicator, if it's not used by anyone else.

CopyTicks.body: CopyTicks(${1:string symbol}, ${2:MqlTick& tickarray[]}, ${3:uint flags=COPY_TICKS_ALL}, ${4:ulong from=0}, ${5:uint count=0})$0
CopyTicks.description: <int> receives ticks in the MqlTick format into ticks_array.

CopyBuffer.body: CopyBuffer(${1:int handle}, ${2:int buffer_number}, ${3:int start_pos|datetime start_time}, ${4:int count|datetime stop_time}, ${5:double buffer[]})$0
CopyBuffer.description: <int> Gets data of a specified buffer of a certain indicator in the necessary quantity.

CopyRates.body: CopyRates(${1:string symbol}, ${2:ENUM_TIMEFRAMES timeframe}, ${3:int start_pos|datetime start_time}, ${4:int count|datetime stop_time}, ${5:MqlRates rates_array[]})$0
CopyRates.description: <int> Gets history data of MqlRates structure of a specified symbol-period in specified quantity into the rates_array array. The elements ordering of the copied data is from present to the past, i.e., starting position of 0 means the current bar.

EventSetMillisecondTimer.description: <bool> indicates to the client terminal that timer events should be generated at intervals less than one second for this Expert Advisor or indicator.

EventSetTimer.description: <bool> indicates to the client terminal, that for this indicator or Expert Advisor, events from the timer must be generated with the specified periodicity.

EventKillTimer.description: <bool> Specifies the client terminal that is necessary to stop the generation of events from Timer.

EventChartCustom.description: <bool> The function generates a custom event for the specified chart.
